rules_text: Migratory Lambeodon and creatures you control with mounts can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
special_text:
Mount {2}{G}{G} [i](Put this under target creature you own without a mount until it leaves the battlefield. It gains all abilities, counters, and base power and toughness from this. Mount only as a sorcery.)[/i]
Migratory Lambeodon and creatures you control with mounts can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less.
